name: SACHIN MITTAL
experience: PROJECT-1 -- Smartbox is a global provider of smart locker technology. It provides a wide range of smart locker
applications that can be deployed in diverse industry verticals. This technology of smart lockers offers secure,
eﬃcient, accountable, convenient package delivery and auditable asset storage while giving users 24/7 access
to lockers and the ability to track deliveries remotely. It is now working for rental services to provide these
lockers for certain time period to consumers to store their assets securely.
Technologies :- Smartbox Application is an Angular Application embedded with backend server based on Spring
Boot Application which uses Java with Hibernate & JPA, spring Rest. It also uses IOT services to make this
PROJECT -2 -- Appartment Locker is also a ﬂavour for smartbox , it provides the services to delivery boys 24*7 ,
to drop the customer's parcel in lockers, whenever they are not present at their place. So rhat they can get it
anytime whenever they are back to their site.
Technologies :- Springboot , Microservices , JPA (hibernate), Restful API , Kafka , Keycloak , Consul, Mysql , IOT
